tasks.title: Check context status
tasks.description: Evaluate context/tracker.json items and update it directly; also produce context/check_summary.md (combined summary + details needed).

tasks.title: Brainstorm idea (raw → structured)
tasks.description: Convert a raw idea into a structured spec in context/idea.md, including title, elevator pitch, features, risks, and milestones.
examples: Brainstorm this idea: 'generate workout plans from calendar'
Help me evolve an idea into an explainable spec

tasks.title: Log an idea (with hotness tracking)
tasks.description: Capture ideas into context/idea.md. If same idea is logged again, increment hotness score instead of duplicating. Always confirm before writing.
examples: Add idea for GraphQL API (already mentioned before)

tasks.title: Top next to-dos
tasks.description: Produce the top 3–5 to-dos to focus on for the next commit, based on tracker.json, idea.md, to_do.md, and goal.md.
examples: What should I work on next for this idea?

tasks.title: Update to-do list
tasks.description: Append one or more new items to context/to_do.md (creates file if missing).

tasks.title: Add a to-do item
tasks.description: Capture actionable tasks and append them to context/to_do.md under today's session header. Always require confirm before writing.
examples: Log a task for updating README

tasks.title: Log a project gap
tasks.description: Capture gaps or limitations in the project and append them to context/gaps.md with an incremental ID, title, description, impact, and optional fix. Always require confirm before writing.
examples: Log a gap: missing error handling for login
Add project gap with high impact

tasks.title: Summarize current session (diff-driven)
tasks.description: Create a session summary by analyzing staged and unstaged diffs (pending changes). Draft 'Worked On' line-items from the diffs, preview them, and append to context/session_log.md on explicit confirm.
examples: Summarize this session from current diffs
Create session log from staged and unstaged changes

tasks.title: Report and log a new bug
tasks.description: Collect structured details about a bug and create a new file under context/bugs/BUG-XXX.md with YAML metadata and sections. Always require explicit confirm before writing.
examples: Log a bug about crashing on login
Report a bug with steps to reproduce

tasks.title: Describe a bug
tasks.description: Given a Bug ID (BUG-XXX), read context/bugs/BUG-XXX.md and produce a concise structured description (ID, title, status, reproduction steps, expected vs actual, notes). Read-only, never modifies files.

tasks.title: Define steps to solve a bug
tasks.description: Given a Bug ID (per-file under context/bugs/BUG-XXX.md), analyze it and produce root-cause hypotheses, a debugging checklist, development tasks (with effort), and tests. Offer to append tasks to context/to_do.md but never write without explicit confirm.
examples: Create a fix plan for BUG-010

tasks.title: Close a bug
tasks.description: Given a Bug ID, collect resolution details, update status to Resolved, add a Resolution block and a History entry to context/bugs/BUG-###.md. Always require explicit confirm before writing.

tasks.title: Git commit helper
tasks.description: Refine a commit message, propose branch name, and generate exact git commands to run locally (never run automatically).
examples: Commit current changes with message 'wip: add login UI'

tasks.title: Git status helper
tasks.description: Check current git status (modified, staged, untracked files) and produce a short report.
examples: Which files are modified and staged?

tasks.title: Git diff helper
tasks.description: Inspect repo changes by running git diff commands. Categorize Added/Modified/Deleted/Renamed files and save a report to artifacts/git_diff_report.md.
examples: Show git diff for last commit
What files changed in staged diff?

tasks.title: Git add helper
tasks.description: Stage files for commit by generating explicit git add commands based on user input. Always confirm before finalizing.

tasks.title: Git sync after PR merge
tasks.description: Switch back to main, pull latest changes after a PR merge, clean up feature branch (on confirm), and summarize repository status.
examples: Sync my local repo after merging PR
Clean up feature branch and pull main

tasks.title: Update README.md (staged-diff first, orchestrates internal tasks)
tasks.description: Use staged diff as the source of truth. Orchestrate internal tasks (git_status, git_diff, git_add, check_context, git_commit) to gather data, present inline README edits derived from staged changes, and on explicit 'confirm' apply edits. Never run git or push automatically; always require human confirmation for writes and staging.
examples: Update README using staged changes and internal tasks

tasks.title: List available tasks
tasks.description: Display all registered tasks with their id, title, description, and example invocations.
